name: Against Chaos
description:
" World has been swallowed up in Chaos. It came quickly, like a tsunami rolling over everything. Black waves covered houses, people, and animals. And they changed, turned into aggressive monsters. I was lucky, at that moment there was an artifact nearby that glows and stopped the Chaos. I may be the last survivor, but I have to look, maybe there are other artifacts and survivors... "

Against Chaos - is a game between the first person shooter and survival horror with building system. Also with interesting and strange game idea in which you must fight against chaos forces only by your own, hoping to find survivors and overcome the chaos.

  • To fight Chaos you have to take the sectors, captured by enemies. Defeat all of them at the location and build 2 torches using B button to light up the sector and clean it from Chaos.
  • In this game you have different variety of weapons: from crossbows to automatic weapons, what will help in the battle with chaos.
  • You has a limited supply of mana. Mana is spent when shooting, taking damage and building. To replenish mana, you have to kill the enemies and build the generators, that will generate it.

Controls:

W A S DMoveLeft Mouse ButtonShootMouse WheelSwitch WeaponBOpen Build Menu

This game is made by a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 and its theme was Let There be Chaos.
